This sighting device is recommended only for vehicles that support the automatic laser ranging and sight adjustment feature. Before engaging enemies at long range, please use your rangefinder to measure the distance before firing. Compatible with vehicles from all nations.
We hope you enjoy this sight.

#tf2

This is my version of Gladiators Sight instead of Cyan and Magenta it is Bright Green and Purple
Bright Green (0,255,0) for normal day or in Thermals
Purple (195,0,255) for Snow maps or in Night Vision

Here is the steps on how to install
1. Download the PurgeSOSSights folder
2. Copy PurgeSight into the UserSights folder in War Thunder and in all_tanks you might need GladiatorSight just in case as well
3. Go into War Thunder and go to the sight customisation for ground battles and select the PurgeSight reticle
4. Save the preset and name it to whatever than close War Thunder
5. go to ...

The BTR-80A's sighting grid is currently my last work, as the tox community is not ready for historical and accurate sighting grids. It's only getting better! I know how to wait and accept, but can the community do the same? It's a big question that I don't have an answer for #sight #wtdraw #realistic #historical

You guys don't even wanna know how long it took to remove all the lines because I just find out the limit is 2700 for lines. I had to do longer lines and cut out A LOT of things. One more to go for Rainy, enjoy! Next week is finals week so Ima be inactive. Stay tuned yall! And don't worry, feet sights will continue for my gooners. Also,

"Nadia is love, Nadia is life"
-ItzRainyBoy 2025

Всем привет и это перезалив. Сделал новый прицел (доработал), исходное изображение я не стану выкладывать, не скажу почему иначе его опять забанят. Просто не могу, если загляните в Discord то там возможно найдёте прицел который я ранее выкладывал именно по этому персонажу.

Hello! For all fans of WuWa (and just gooners) I've decided to create a sight of new character Chisa :3.

Altho the main reason is she is literally my Wife and I wanted to see her 24/7 so first I asked on Wladimir_Lenin discord server for someone to make it for me. And later I tried it myself, so here are both versions!

crs. to Grim_chocole on the Discord Server {chisa.blk}

mine sight is {ChisaMyWaif.blk}

Enjoy gooners
